hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdul `Aziz:I went out to Mina on the day of Tarwiya and met Anas going on a donkey. I asked him, "Where did the Prophet (ﷺ) offer the Zuhr prayer on this day?" Anas replied, "See where your chiefs pray and pray similarly

chapter.ara-name: باب أَيْنَ يُصَلِّي الظُّهْرَ يَوْمَ التَّرْوِيَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Where to offer the Zuhr prayer on the day of Tarwiya
